boundaries-data: NASA GMAO MERRA-2 reanalysis variables: snowfall, total precipitation, evaporation, 2-m air temperature, skin temperature, and the M2R12K 12.5 km replay

constraining-observations.other: Trusel et al., 2013 QSCAT derived meltwater fluxes

comments:
The gridded product was too large to submit via this system, but it can be downloaded here via Box: https://nasagov.box.com/shared/static/vkje84gtqo8lxar3f5lbou5ti6vxw0zt.zip
 
The uploaded document is the revised submission of our TCD article: https://doi.org/10.5194/tc-2020-266.  The revision has more details relevant to this submission.
